episode.title: Top Men
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Matthew Panzarino returns to the show to talk about his exclusive behind-the-scenes profile with Apple’s Pro Workflow Team and state of Apple’s professional Mac hardware and software.
episode.showNotes:
Matthew Panzarino returns to the show to talk about his exclusive behind-the-scenes profile with Apple’s Pro Workflow Team and state of Apple’s professional Mac hardware and software.

Links:

  • Matthew Panzarino: “Apple’s 2019 Mac Pro Will Be Shaped by Workflows”.
  • Apple’s 1990 Mac IIfx, which cost $9-12,000 in 1990 dollars.
